import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import { useForm, Controller } from "react-hook-form"; import ReactMde from "react-mde"; import Markdown from "react-markdown"; import { useAuthState } from "../context/auth"; import { gql, hasuraAdminClient } from "../lib/hasura-admin-client"; import { hasuraUserClient } from "../lib/hasura-user-client"; const GetUsers = gql` { User { Name id } } `; const InsertTask = gql` mutation InsertTask($categoryId: uuid!, $title: String!, $message: String!) { insert_task_one( object: { task_id: $categoryId name: $title posts: { data: { message: $message } } } ) { id title author { name } category { name } posts { message } created_at } } `; export const getStaticProps = async () => { const { users } = await hasuraAdminClient.request(GetUsers); return { props: { users, }, }; }; export default function Task({ users }) { const router = useRouter(); const { isAuthenticated, user } = useAuthState(); const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { handleSubmit, register, control, errors, formState: { isSubmitting }, } = useForm(); const [selectedTab, setSelectedTab] = useState("write"); useEffect(() => { if (!isAuthenticated) router.push("/"); }, [isAuthenticated]); if (!isAuthenticated) return null; const onSubmit = async ({ userId, title, message }) => { try { const { insert_task_one } = await hasura.request(InsertTask, { categoryId, title, message, }); router.push(`/task/${insert_task_one.id}`); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } }; return ( <>
